snippet: Mitt Romney clearly thinks there are votes to be won by comparing President Obama with the interventionist, welfare-loving leaders of Europe. But does he really mean what he says about Europe or is it a campaign ploy? And why do Europe's...
abstract: Mitt Romney clearly thinks there are votes to be won by comparing President Obama with the interventionist, welfare-loving leaders of Europe. But does he really mean what he says about Europe or is it a campaign ploy? And why do Europe's conservatives not like him?

headline.main: Does Mitt Romney Really Abhor Europe?
